page.title: 13A Slindon Ghost Story.
page.content: At Slindon College there is a story told of the ghost of Lady Beaumont, after whom one of the dormitories is named. It is told on cold,dark nights. "One night, I was asleep in my dorm., when I awoke with a start. There,at the bottom of my bed was a shadowy figure. I thought that it was Matron, doing her night rounds, and when she beckoned to me,I followed without a second thought.She slowly drifted along the corridor outside the dorm. I followed a few paces behind. Suddenly she turned, and it was then I realised that she had no face! She advanced menacingly towards me and I stood rooted to the spot.She came closer and closer,__then passed straight through me, leaving only a chill feeling and a stench of death.I awoke my friends and was told I had met the Ghost of Lady Beaumont." (This is not a true story!)
